channel.title: Need help with donation system
channel.description:
I've done PHP and MySQL work for the past six years, so I'm handled with the website things and could probably get things to work. However, I have no idea what to do on the java sided part of the donation system. Help would be appreciated, contact via PM if you can help. -The Web guy
Also, can exchange for website work, I'm certified in HTML, CSS, PHP, and MySQL. But can also do JavaScript and Ajax, if needed. Also very good with graphics as it ties into website design.

item.title: Need help with donation system
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

This is why stating your base and revision helps, so I don’t get the impression you’re using a 317. And no, I don’t know of any tutorials for 503+ revisions. Sorry.

Looks like i’ll have to port a 317 one, thanks for the help.

Read full topic
